post.body: I need that. Gotta find the money!<coco >
cool i'll do that when i get home. I dont have the pleasure of blackberry ;-)
Sweet! hey ur not a crazy undercover that'll try to expose local teachers r u?
hannalicious yay for pics! Is ur facebook link on twitter? <coco >
It's not like we MADE them work there. This isn't some sort of strange "dystopian" society where they fell into that job.
A trip to walmart provided many violent fantasies -- ever wonder why people are so rude at places like McD's and Walmart?
A lot of people aren't too in to The Strangers because it's so "unreal" but I think the concept is frightening.
I've been considering blogging. Especially after last night's events.
Have you seen The Strangers? How about The Evil Dead?
I spent Thanksgiving watching horror movies...but I get a little spooked and have to take a...break...lol 2 breaks 1 tweet
I won't. I didn't say I HOPE...:)
I do believe Karma works in powerful ways. Maybe she'll get stranded during her trip over the holiday season.
Ohh! I see...ya, but he doesn't work miracles for petty shit. Oops. Maybe I need him to fix my profanity-loving mouth.
THe Foscue Plantation House? Where is it? How much did it cost?
What a disappointment--not surprising. THANKS Keanu... <coco >
The day the earth stood still <coco >
Almost done shopping for christmas. Whew. I wish i had more $ to spare.
What if blue skies all of a sudden turned a purple hue?
Heading to Wilmington. Mood: Cantankerous. Don't mess with me. >:|
I've changed my twitter alias. Is this a bad thing? melissa_salas
In response to the CNN twitter...how dare he give Iraq high hopes?
Thinking about blogging and going to Wilmington, though not at the same time...unless James drives.
I came back from Walmart wanting to kill a McDonald's Employee. No one stopped you from going to college. I didn't make you work there.
needs to do something more interesting with her love of words.
loading up the house. :(
SO ready for this week to be over. 40 more minutes!
That woman that sold me a broken electric razor told me I need God. WTF? I don't need God to be a good person.
I never thought about how interesting Mercutio's character is -- so that's why Shakespeare kills him off.
I forgot my phone at home. WHatever shall I do?!
Last day of work for two whole weeks! Yay!!!
:( Upset. About more things than one. Pathetically sad.
Got scammed on Lejeuneyardsales.com by Natalie Harms. She sold me an electric shaver that doesn't charge because the base doesn't turn on.
still packing. little stuff is annoying.
Ugh <coco >
One more class period to go. And then tomorrow. UGH
Sad today. Secret santa keeps giving me gifts for my house. He obviously doesn't know I'm moving back in2 my parents' place this weekend.
I think I'm going to sleep now.
Waiting at Texas Roadhouse. What is going on?! <coco >
Students just told me IFm intimidating. Sweet <coco >
Got any ideas on what I can get my mother? She's got everything. NO JEWELRY and NO SPA CERTIFICATES.
